Material used.Description: A mouse Neuro2a cell and a human embryonic kidney cell line 293T cells were used. These cells were maintained in Dulbecco's supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum at 37 Â°C under 5% CO2.

Readout description.Conclusion: Both siRNA vectors reduced expression level of endogenous mouse DJ-1 in Neuro2a cells or endogenous human DJ-1 in 293T cells by more than 90% on band intensity
Readout description.Result Description: Both siRNA vectors reduced expression level of endogenous mouse DJ-1 in Neuro2a cells or endogenous human DJ-1 in 293T cells by more than 90% on band intensity of Western blotting at 48 h after the transfection

Biological replicates.Description: All above results were confirmed by three independent experiments

Basic negative control.Description: As negative controls, siRNA - expressing vectors expressing shuffled siRNA sequence were used

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Trypan blue exclusion method, measurement of cytoplasmic lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) activity, counting cells with nuclear condensation

Material used.Description: Neuro2a or 293T cells in 24 - well culture plates were used

Readout description.Conclusion: See results for different stress conditions
Readout description.Molecular Effect: See results for different stress conditions
Readout description.Result Description: After down - regulation of endogenous DJ - 1, Neuro2a cells were more susceptible to oxidative stress with H2O2; cell death induced by pro - apoptotic stimulus was not influenced; over - expression of wild - type DJ - 1 rescued cell death induced by oxidative stress, but not L166P mutant DJ - 1; ER - stress and proteasome inhibition - induced cell deaths were enhanced by down - regulation of endogenous DJ - 1; over - expression of wild - type DJ - 1 decreased cell death at higher concentrations of tunicamycin, thapsigargin, and lactacystin, but not L166P mutant DJ - 1; over - expression of L166P DJ - 1 seemed to have a toxic effect at lower concentrations; over - expression of DJ - 1 rescued Pael - R - induced cell death

Biological replicates.Description: All above results were confirmed by three independent experiments

Basic negative control.Description: As negative controls, siRNA - expressing vectors expressing shuffled siRNA sequence were used

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: p - values were used: p < 0.01, p < 0.001, p < 0.05 for different comparisons as described in figure legends
